abstract: University of Louisville begins investigating allegations that former employee Andre McGee paid escorts to have sex with basketball recruits.
lead_paragraph: The University of Louisville started an investigation into allegations that Andre McGee, a former employee, paid an escort service to provide sex for basketball recruits.

headline.main: Louisville Inquiry Looks Into Claims of Sex for Recruits
headline.print_headline: Louisville Looks Into Claim of Sex for Recruits

snippet: The University of Louisville started an investigation into allegations that Andre McGee, a former employee, paid an escort service to provide sex for basketball recruits.
